Azmodan.name: Globe Of Annihilation
Azmodan.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact. Long range.

Azmodan.name: Summon Demon Warrior
Azmodan.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 37 (+4% per level) damage per second and last for 10.5 seconds.

Azmodan.name: All Shall Burn
Azmodan.description: Channel a death beam on an enemy dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage a second. The damage amount grows the longer it is channeled, to a maximum of 200 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Does 25% more damage to Structures. Azmodan can move at 40% speed while channeling.

Azmodan.name: Black Pool
Azmodan.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

Azmodan.name: Demonic Invasion
Azmodan.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 (+4% per level) damage and have 365 (+4% per level) health.

Azmodan.name: General of Hell
Azmodan.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan's Summons. The Lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum Health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Azmodan's Summons. Unlimited range.

1.name: Taste for Blood
1.description: Quest: Kill enemy Minions and Heroes within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation.  Reward: Enemy Minions that die increase its damage by 2.  Reward: Enemy Heroes that die increase its damage by 10.  Maximum bonus damage of 500.

1.name: Sieging Wrath
1.description: Quest: Every time Globe of Annihilation hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 4, up to 100. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

1.name: Master of Destruction
1.description: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Every 1.5 seconds spent channeling increases the range by 10%, to a maximum of 30%.

4.name: Gluttony
4.description: All Shall Burn heals Azmodan for 25% of the damage dealt.

4.name: Army of Hell
4.description: Increases Demon Warrior's damage by 20% and reduces their Mana cost by 20.

4.name: Hellish Hirelings
4.description: The damage bonus from General of Hell is doubled on Mercenaries.

4.name: Sin's Grasp
4.description: Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 247.5 (+4% per level) damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

7.name: Infernal Globe
7.description: Globe of Annihilation's cast time is decreased by 40% and its missile speed is increased by 40%.

7.name: Bound Minion
7.description: Using General of Hell on a Minion grants them 75 Armor from non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take by 75%, while also  increasing the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

7.name: Gluttonous Ward
7.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3% of Azmodan's maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

7.name: March of Sin
7.description: Increases Azmodan's Movement Speed while channeling All Shall Burn to 80% of normal speed.

10.name: Demonic Invasion
10.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 (+4% per level) damage and have 365 (+4% per level) health.

10.name: Black Pool
10.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Hellforged Armor
13.description: Demon Warriors deal 10 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every second and are granted 50 Armor against non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take 50%.

13.name: Hedonism
13.description: Reduces Globe of Annihilation's Mana cost by 30.

13.name: Infused Power
13.description: All Shall Burn's damage growth maximum is increased by 40%.

16.name: Battleborn
16.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits an enemy, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the impact point.

16.name: Demonic Smite
16.description: Every 7.5 seconds, the Demon Lieutenant will blast a non-Heroic unit dealing 411 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Sin for Sin
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

20.name: Perishing Flame
20.description: When the Grunts die they explode, dealing 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

20.name: Fifth Circle
20.description: Black Pool makes Basic Attacks and Abilities slow enemies Attack and Movement Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

20.name: Forced Recruitment
20.description: Reduces General of Hell's cooldown by 10 seconds and gains an additional charge.
